name: Octopus Business Management
overview:
Octopus is a web application designed specifically for on site service companies; companies that do their work in the field, such as painting, landscaping, window cleaning and snow removal.

The software provides all of the standard customer relationship management functionality you would expect, but also provides features uniquely suited to the needs of our target market, such as management of quotes, work orders and invoices in a linearly connected work flow system, time sheet management, labour resource scheduling, and an advanced and highly integrated task management system with a full featured drag-and-drop calendar interface.

Octopus has built-in intelligence to help make sure business owners aren’t forgetting about important events like quote and work order follow ups and past due invoices needing collection activity. This business intelligence is fully configurable, and frees management from having to constantly keep tabs on the ever shifting landscape of their day-to-day business activity, allowing them to focus on higher value business development.
